Engine details: 692cc parallel-twin, cast iron crankshaft, alloy connecting rods and pistons, independent heads and iron cylinders
Rear brakes: Expanding brake (drum brake). Single expanding drum
Wheels: 40 spoke 1-over-2, QD rear hub. Dunlop tires.
Frame type: Chromoly brazed, single tapered downtube, cradle type
Comments: First year for Super Meteor model. Largest displacement twin at the time of production.
Electrical: 6v Lucas RM14 70w A.C. generator, bridge rectifier, electric horn,
Driveline: Albion gearbox w/ neutral finder, 530 Chain 100 link
Light: 7´ Lucas headlamp w/ switch and ammeter, twin pilot lights, stop/tail lights
